name: Delight Boulder Dash 2
overview: Another treat from the Belgian Basehead, No One. This time another 20 caves with a randomizer that puts the levels in an unexpected order and you can change the type of foes and obstacles to delight you. Over a million combinations can be had! Originally released in 1987 and re-released on August 7, 1988. Created using the PLCK version of the Construction Kit and caves from several different (mostly Belgian) makers. Every time you play it will be different.
